actions.committee: Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry.

official_title: A bill directing the Secretary of Agriculture to convey the property comprising the Lee Canyon Youth Camp, Toiyabe National Forest, Nev., to Clark County, Nev.

summary.text: Authorizes and directs the Secretary of Agriculture to convey by quitclaim deed the property comprising the Lee Canyon Youth Camp, Toiyabe National Forest, in the State of Nevada to Clark County in such State.

titles.title: A bill directing the Secretary of Agriculture to convey the property comprising the Lee Canyon Youth Camp, Toiyabe National Forest, Nev., to Clark County, Nev.
